function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rise in calls to a helpline observed across all states.","Impact":"Potential indication of increased violence against women.","Mitigation":"Implement proactive measures to address and prevent intimate partner violence.","Technologies":"Data analysis and predictive modeling to anticipate potential hotspots for violence.","People":"Women at risk of intimate partner violence.","Owner":"Government, non-profit organizations, and community leaders."},{"Description":"Lockdown measures limit face-to-face interviews for data collection on violence against women.","Impact":"Reduced availability of reliable data on intimate partner violence.","Mitigation":"Utilize alternative methods for data collection such as phone interviews or online surveys.","Technologies":"Remote data collection tools and technologies for survey administration.","People":"Researchers, data collectors, and organizations monitoring violence against women.","Owner":"Research institutions and data collection agencies."},{"Description":"Delays in the availability of data on intimate partner violence due to limited implementation of surveys.","Impact":"Lack of timely information for decision-making and intervention planning.","Mitigation":"Develop strategies for interim data collection using available resources and technology.","Technologies":"Data scraping, remote sensing, and mobile data collection tools.","People":"Decision-makers, policy planners, and organizations working on violence prevention.","Owner":"Government agencies, research institutions, and non-profit organizations."}]}
